messages.subject: Hello (again!)
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, everyone! I m back! Using a different email address though. To reintroduce myself, my name is Elizabeth. I m a 28 y/o SAHM of four children. Sarah is 8;
messages.messageBody:
Hey, everyone! I'm back! Using a different email address though.

To reintroduce myself, my name is Elizabeth. I'm a 28 y/o SAHM of
four children. Sarah is 8; Logan is 4; Megan is nearly 3; and Gracie
is 10 months old.

Things have been absolutely nuts, and I had to take a break from
things for awhile. Sarah went back to school during that time, and
finishes up on Monday.

Now that she is home again and we're moving we're looking to put
everything behind us and move on with our lives. Paul is not wild
about us unschooling, but as it is Sarah has asked to do certain
things that are more schoolish. I'd love to try to persuade her
against anything schoolish, but I'm having to remember that it's HER
life and if she wants to do some things in "that" way that it's
alright as it's her choice.

So things are settling down again finally, and I thought I'd head
back this way! I've missed the discussions here!

Elizabeth
